name: Disco No.1
overview:
Disco No. 1 (AKA Sweet Heart) is an arcade game released in 1982 by Data East. The game was available on DECO Cassette System and conventional versions. Disco No 1 was released in March 1982. It was known as the 19th video game (Cassette no. 19) made for the Deco Cassette System.

The player plays as a 90-pound weakling kid in a roller rink who has to skate around the bad guys in order to win the love of cute girls. Earn points by completely encircling one or more tough guys and picking up various bonus items that float across the rink.
